Home Football Rodrygo and Bellingham opened the two-horse battle when they both scored two beautiful goals against Bilbao, cooling the fans' hearts

Rodrygo and Bellingham opened the two-horse battle when they both scored two beautiful goals against Bilbao, cooling the fans' hearts

Football Emily · 13/08/2023 · Jude Bellingham

﻿Spain's Bilbao, August 12 (Reuters) - Real Madrid won 2-0 against Athletic Bilbao to begin their La Liga campaign on Saturday thanks to goals from Rodrygo and newly acquired Jude Bellingham.

Bellingham, who won the game's MVP award and cost Borussia Dortmund 103 million euros with a further 30 million euros in add-ons, was unstoppable as he made persistent challenges and generated many chances up front.

The 20-year-old Bellingham worked well with Rodrygo and Vinicius Jr. in the new 4-4-2 system after former Ballon d'Or winner Karim Benzema moved for Saudi Arabia.
